name: Twyla
description:
Twyla is a first-person visual novel set in the depths of outer space. On planet Earth, a series of cataclysms occur that lead to the death of civilization. In order to preserve the best Earthmen's lives, Capsules of Life were sent to different parts of the Universe. Twyla left the Earth using one of the capsules. After a long time, her ship docked at an unknown old station. What incredible events await this gorgeous, fragile, but brave girl?



Over 250 still images and over 70 animated scenes
1-2 hours of play
Fascinating mystery
30 songs
Lots of lewd scenes
